citation: Proclamation under the Credit (Commonwealth Powers) (Transitional and Consequential Provisions) Act 2009 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Credit (Commonwealth Powers) (Transitional and Consequential Provisions) Act 2009

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Credit (Commonwealth Powers) (Transitional and Consequential Provisions) Act 2009 fix 1 July 2010 as the day on which the provisions of that Act commence.

17 May 2010

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

NICK McKIM

Minister for Corrections and Consumer Protection

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 26 May 2010

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice.
